moves.1... d5 2. e3 e5 3. h3: Waste of time, but... how to exploit it?
moves.7. Bb2 O-O 8. Bg2 Be6 9. Ne2: White hyperpassive play is difficult to handle.
moves.12. e4: As it was to be expected...
moves.14. Qxa5 Nxa5 15. Nd2: White is playing very easily, and I don't find a way to break in.
moves.17. Ngf3 h6: No rush this time. This prevents Ng5.
moves.19... cxd3+ 20. Kxd3: After a long think. If cxd3, I have some chances on b3. Now, B or N to c4?
moves.20... Nc4: Either ways, I'll have a clamp on white's dsb.
moves.21. Nxc4: Which piece to retake with? c2 is easy to defend for white... but enough?
moves.22. Ke2: d3+ gives the center for nothing.
moves.22... c3 23. Bc1: White's dsb and R are unable to move.
moves.23... Bc4+ 24. Ke1: Decisive advantage, but... how to close? I now think that d3 was a must.
moves.25. Nh4: ...I can't play g5 at once, because of Nf5, and his N is doing something.
moves.25... Kh7: ? I always have d3, but I was to block any possible countergame first.
moves.26. Nf5 Bc7: Now white N's force is fooled.
moves.27. Ne7: Just helps me relocating my R.
moves.27... Rcd8 28. Nc6 Rd7 29. a4: White can take the A pawn, true, but... d3 will come!
moves.29... d3 30. cxd3: It was a won game, wasn't it?
moves.31... Nxe4: I'll lose an exchange by force, so why not to grab this juicy central pawn...
moves.35... Be4: It's not a real fork, since after...
moves.36. Rg1: If BxN, Rxc3, and one of my B is gone. I'll grab a5, but he a7... no deal.
moves.38. b5 Ba5: I'll lose my B pair, but I can't see more.
moves.39. Kd2: An exchange and a pawn... maybe two...
moves.39... Bxc3+ 40. Kxc3 Bxc6 41. bxc6 Rxc6+: ...and this should roughly be a draw!
moves.45. Re3 Rh2 46. Ka5 Rxh3 47. Ka6: I have to hurry for a draw.
moves.51. Rg4 Rxf3 52. Rxg2 Rxf5 53. Kxa7 Ra5+: ...and this should be a drawn... or not? I never remember...
I'll try this way, but it smells like drawn.
moves.64. Kb4 Kf6 65. Kc3 g5 66. Kd3 Kf5 67. K: and the WK has the opposition...
moves.68... g4 69. Rxf4+ Kxf4: ...and... can you believe it? My opponent resigned!
